# Upcoming Events

### 4/18 - April SoCalRUG Meetup 

Stay tuned for details about our April monthly meetup at PeopleSpace. Going forward, we're hoping to host meetups at PeopleSpace every third Tuesday of the month.

If you have any recommendations on local speakers or presenters, or want to learn about a specific data science topic, R package, etc., please let us know!

### 4/22-4/23 Data Science Hackathon

Save the date, we will be hosting a Data Science Hackathon at UC-Irvine.

# Shiny App Demo as a Cover Letter

#### Speaker: Our own **Javier Orraca-Deatcu**
[Javier Orraca-Deatcu](https://www.javierorracadeatcu.com) has a strong foundation in consulting and spent over twelve years in financial modeling and valuation prior to pivoting into data science. During this time, he honed his analytical and problem-solving skills, providing clients with insights to inform critical business decisions around the M&A deal cycle. Over the last five years, Javier shifted his professional focus to programming with R for the purposes of data science and MLOps. He is adept at extracting insights from complex data sets, enabling businesses to make data-driven decisions, and he develops and deploys ML models using a range of technologies including cloud platforms and containerization.


*Bio written by ChatGPT*
